text: John Michael Jumper (born 1985) is an American chemist and computer scientist. He is a director at DeepMind Technologies. Jumper is known for creating an artificial intelligence (AI) model to predict protein structures from their amino acid sequence. Jumper and Demis Hassabis were awarded half of the 2024 Nobel Prize in Chemistry for their predictions of protein structures. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American biochemists Category:American computer scientists Category:Scientists from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Researchers
title: John M. Jumper
